alignTextarea.description: Whether the pop-up box is aligned with the input box
alignTextarea.description_zh: 弹出框是否与输入框对齐

allowClear.description: Allows the input field to be cleared

error.description: Whether it is an error state. (Deprecated, removed in the next major version, replaced with status='error')
error.description_zh: 是否是错误状态。(废弃，下个大版本移除，使用 status='error' 替代)

split.description: A separator before and after the selection

value.description: Enter a value for the field

position.type: top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br
position.description: The pop-up location of the drop-down box

:clearIcon.description: allowClear when configuring the icon for the Clear button.
:clearIcon.description_zh: allowClear 时配置清除按钮的图标。

:notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when there is no data in the drop-down list
:notFoundContent.description_zh: 下拉列表没有数据时显示的内容

autoSize.description: Whether to automatically adjust the height of the input box
autoSize.description_zh: 是否自动调整输入框的高度

:options.type: (| string| number| { label: ReactNode | string; value: string | number; disabled?: boolean })[]

:triggerProps.description: Props for all trigger components can be accepted
:triggerProps.description_zh: 可以接受所有 Trigger 组件的 Props

:wrapperStyle.description: After the word count is enabled, a layer of div will be encased in the textarea tag, and wrapperStyle will be used to configure the style of this div.
:wrapperStyle.description_zh: 开启字数统计之后，会在 textarea 标签外包一层 div，wrapperStyle 用来配置这个 div 的样式。

:filterOption.description: Whether to filter the data based on the input value can be passed into the function to customize the filtering logic.
:filterOption.description_zh: 是否根据输入的值筛选数据，可传入函数自定义过滤逻辑。

:getPopupContainer.description: The parent node of the pop-up box

events.name: onChange
events.description: Enter a callback when it changes

events.name: onClear
events.description: Click the callback of the Clear button

events.name: onPressEnter
events.description: Push the Enter key to call back
